title: Collaborative Culture-Driven Organizational Learning Capacity Strengthening Program

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic mathematical concepts and experience with basic organizational tasks
context.additional_context: A program to internalize organizational learning mechanisms through mathematical problem-solving, utilizing smartphone-based collaborative tools and simple worksheets.

learning_goals: Learners collaboratively solve two math problems weekly over four weeks and experience a knowledge-sharing system.
Learners write and submit three problem-solving reports incorporating peer feedback.
Learners can explain five collaboration strategies for promoting organizational learning in context-specific scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
